meanings.definition: A person or group of people to whom something is addressed or sent.
meanings.sent1: The addressees of the letter were eagerly waiting for its arrival.
meanings.sent2: The addressees of the package were delighted to receive it.
meanings.sent3: The addressees of the email all replied at the same time, causing a digital traffic jam.
meanings.sent4: The addressees of the invitation felt like VIPs, receiving the exclusive event details.
meanings.sent5: The addressees of the parcel were overjoyed when they saw the surprise inside.

meanings.definition: The intended recipient of a message or communication.
meanings.sent1: The addressees of the memo were expected to attend the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The addressees of the text message replied promptly.
meanings.sent3: The addressees of the joke burst into laughter simultaneously.
meanings.sent4: The addressees of the warning signal quickly took cover.
meanings.sent5: The addressees of the announcement cheered with excitement.
